bug.author: manrajgrover
bug.summary: Second derivative grads throws an error
bug.description:
To get help from the community, check out our <denchmark-link:https://groups.google.com/a/tensorflow.org/forum/#!forum/tfjs>Google group</denchmark-link> . <denchmark-h:h4>TensorFlow.js version</denchmark-h>
0.10.0 <denchmark-h:h4>Browser version</denchmark-h>
Version 65.0.3325.181 <denchmark-h:h4>Describe the problem or feature request</denchmark-h>
In documentation, second derivative example under tf.grad throws error. <denchmark-link:https://js.tensorflow.org/api/0.10.0/#grad>https://js.tensorflow.org/api/0.10.0/#grad</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h4>Code to reproduce the bug / link to feature request</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-link:https://js.tensorflow.org/api/0.10.0/#grad>https://js.tensorflow.org/api/0.10.0/#grad</denchmark-link>
